title: Feelings. Part 1
creator_credit: Environment Audio Visuals, CVV Productions, Cate Fyffe and Justin Shortal
brief_description: Presents seven separate incidents each with its own title and discussion questions: Smoking and drinking; Adolescents joining in with family activities; Cheating in exams; Aspirations; Losing a loved pet; Friendship and trust; Infatuation and embarrassment. Teacher’s notes accompany the video.
